google.description: Tisha and Bradley are at it again. They’re tearing up the ski slopes on their vacation, with their hands and mouths going everywhere except where they’re supposed to be. In our last hot selling adventure, “Come Away With Me”, Tisha ended up taking a trip with Bradley that she had originally planned to take with her boyfriend. Since she got dumped, Bradley, a man of a different persuasion, offered to go with her. This proved to be the best decision ever, because things got hot and heavy as soon as they sat beside each other on the flight. On this next adventure, Bradley wakes Tisha up with a little something on his mind, and Tisha returns the favor in the shower. The story explodes with an erotic climax that evening, as Tisha gets bent over doggy style and pounded in the snow in front of a romantic campfire. This story is so hot, that you won’t want to miss it. bwwm, bwwm erotica, bwwm erotic romance, bwwm romance, bw wm erotica, bw wm, bw wm romance, bw/wm, bw/wm erotica, bw/wm erotic romance, bw/wm romance, ebony erotica, ebony romance, interracial, interracial erotica, interracial erotic romance, interracial romance, interracial sex, billionaire sex, ebony, ebony erotica, ebony erotic romance, ebony romance, ebony sex, black, black erotica, black erotic romance, black romance, black sex,­­
google.title: Come Away With Me: Vol.2 (Interracial BW/WM Erotic Romance)
